name: The-answer-to-everything-js
tagline: In the fast paced world of javascript, where everything moves faster then you can comprehend, this is what you need. It's easier to reason about, better to use and will lead the way into the future. Features: unbelie vably usefull, thought provoking and web scalable.
body:
### This is it!

This is the best thing you'll learn in javascript the next seconds. If you happen to read this far, I've already made my point. It's new, that's for sure... not. There are even two projects on npm that answer the question to live, the universe and everything.

## WTF, why?

There are not yet enough npm packages that do the same. But THIS time, it's better, faster, nicer, easier, more reliable, more scalable and with better to grasp concepts. THIS IS IT! This is the answer: 42.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
